description: This file is a segment of a build recipe or script for Perl ptest (Perl test suite). It includes shell functions for installing the test environment, preparing files, and managing dependencies. It also contains variables and directives related to packaging and testing procedures within a build system, likely associated with Yocto or similar embedded Linux build environment.

methods.name: do_install_ptest
methods.description: Creates test directory, modifies files, extracts tarballs while excluding certain files, creates symbolic links, and cleans host-specific references in test files.

methods.name: populate_packages:prepend
methods.description: Populates the package with *.t test files from the Perl library directory if the 'ptest' feature is enabled in the distribution.
